overview:
## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKAudiogramSampleType] instance.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKAudiogramSampleType] concrete subclass. HealthKit uses this type to store and read audiogram data from the HealthKit store.

# audiogramSampleType()

**Type Method**

Returns an audiogram sample type.

## Declaration

```swift
class func audiogramSampleType() -> HKAudiogramSampleType
```

## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKAudiogramSampleType] instance.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKAudiogramSampleType] concrete subclass. HealthKit uses this type to store and read audiogram data from the HealthKit store.
title: audiogramSampleType()
